column4: any suggestions where to buy a computer that will work with ubuntu good?   you can /msg me the reply if you want to.   my emachines does not work well, so i've decided to buy another computer.
where did you buy your computer?
I bought this piece of ... hardware about 2-3 years ago at Office Depot... it's held up well and I got a a free warranty extenstion (totally like 3 years) because Toshiba had a class action lawsuit
